archimate:Product.name: webweb
archimate:Product.documentation:
webweb: a tool for creating, displaying, and sharing interactive network visualizations on the web. Require knowledge of Python, Networkx, or Matlab to build and launch a visualization in the browser. at https://webwebpage.github.io/
Looks quite simple and nice, even if not shown how to add images. TO INVESTIGATE if working with Python
